author: taylor
msg: transactional interceptors to playback failed DAO DML operations
useful for databases such as Oracle TAF for failover of client connections

author: taylor
msg: this is a test method that i will soon delete
im checking it in for other developers to test tx DAO behavior for JS2-495

author: taylor
msg: In some app servers the module's default constructor is called instead of our preferred constructor
via Spring. This attempts to resolve Spring dependencies at a later time than at construction

author: rooneg
msg: * configure.in: Fix the test for ancient FreeBSD that fails on a 6.0-CURRENT Machine.  Use the kern.osreldate sysctl which gives us a stable versioning method.  We already use it for the FreeBSD version detection in the build hints code.
